I hear a lot of Americans saying â€œI went for a hike todayâ€¦â€ in posts that are accompanied by often beautiful pictures of the US vast and varied landscape.

But what is â€œa hikeâ€ to your average American? Because to me (British), a hike is a 20 mile hike up a large hill/mountain. Is it the same?
